name: Earth Survivor
description:
Embark on a thrilling interstellar mission to chase down and annihilate Horrors looming from the depths of space, hellbent on invading our cherished home planet. Immerse yourself in the journey as you level up and upgrade your starship, amplifying both its offensive and defensive capabilities. With the destiny of Earth hanging in the balance, it's up to you, the courageous pilot, to avert catastrophe and protect humanity's future from these malevolent extraterrestrial monstrosities. Join the epic battle and become the ultimate savior of our world!

Made for Untitled Game Jam #75 and Mouse Jam #2.

Controls

Mouse movement Move the mouse to target enemies and rotate your ship. Left mouse button Activate ship drive. Propels the ship forward into the direction it's facing. Right mouse button Fires ion impulses if you have the ion cannon upgrade (the reticle will show the "READY" indicator).
